cleaned_text: It Definitely Can Hurt hosted by Steve Muir Steve Muir Los Angeles Steve Muir discusses and debunks alternative medicine with the company of various guests. The show can be found live on KCIA Saturdays at 3pm. The podcast is released on Sundays. If you have a topic or question about alternative medicine you would like to hear discussed on the show, please email itdefinitelycanhurt@gmail.com.
